case.title: Marriage minded Latina BBW - 34 (Bronx)
case.text: 34 year old professional BBW Latina seeking single, available, professional male, between 34-45. No kids, no baby-mama drama. Be employed and living on your own. Must love movies, traveling, and cats. No mama's boys. Must be looking for something serious. Your pic gets mine. If you only send a pic or a non-descriptive e-mail, I will delete your e-mail. If you ask me if I am real, you will never find out as your e-mail will be erased. Not looking for games.
